TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SaveFileDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog
Public NotInheritable Class SaveFileDialog Inherits FileDialog
public ref class SaveFileDialog sealed : System::Windows::Forms::FileDialog

summary.span: 提示用户选择文件的保存位置。

span.span: Prompts the user to select a location for saving a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类可以打开和覆盖现有文件，也可以创建新的文件。This class can either open and overwrite an existing file or create a new file. 此类的大部分功能都可在 类中找到。Most of the functionality for this class is found in the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 、设置成员、使用 方法调用对话框，以及保存当前文件。The following code example illustrates creating a , setting members, calling the dialog box using the method, and saving the current file. 该示例需要一个带有按钮的窗体。The example requires a form with a button placed on it. [!code-cpp[Classic SaveFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SaveFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SaveFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SaveFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SaveFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SaveFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以安全地在任何安全区域中实例化此类;适当的权限要求放置在各个属性和方法上。This class is safe to instantiate in any security zone; appropriate permission demands are placed on the individual properties and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CreatePrompt { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如果用户指定不存在的文件，对话框是否提示用户允许创建该文件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box prompts the user for permission to create a file if the user specifies a file that does not exist.

value.span: 在用户指定的文件名不存在的情况下，如果在创建该文件之前对话框对用户进行提示，则为 ；如果对话框不征得用户许可就自动创建一个对话框，则为 。

span.span: if the dialog box prompts the user before creating a file if the user specifies a file name that does not exist; if the dialog box automatically creates the new file without prompting the user for permission.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 和 方法与流一起使用。The following code example demonstrates using the and methods with streams. 它还演示了如何使用 、、和 成员。It also demonstrates using the , , , and members. 这是一个完整的示例，可以在将其复制到项目时运行。This is a complete example that is ready to run when you copy it to your project. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Stream OpenFile() cil managed

summary.span: 打开用户选定的具有读/写权限的文件。

span.span: Opens the file with read/write permission selected by the user.
The read/write file selected by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 出于安全目的，此方法会创建一个具有所选名称的新文件，并使用读/写权限打开它。For security purposes, this method creates a new file with the selected name and opens it with read/write permissions. 如果选择要保存到的现有文件，这可能会导致意外丢失数据。This can cause unintentional loss of data if you select an existing file to save to. 若要在保留现有数据的同时将数据保存到现有文件，请使用 类，使用 属性中返回的文件名打开该文件。To save data to an existing file while retaining existing data, use the class to open the file using the file name returned in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 ，设置成员，使用 方法调用对话框，并打开选定的文件。The following code example illustrates creating a , setting members, calling the dialog box using the method, and opening the selected file. 该示例需要一个带有按钮的窗体。The example requires a form with a button placed on it. [!code-cpp[Classic SaveFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SaveFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SaveFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SaveFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SaveFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SaveFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如果用户指定的文件名已存在， 对话框是否显示警告。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box displays a warning if the user specifies a file name that already exists.

value.span: 在用户指定的文件名存在的情况下，如果在覆盖该文件之前对话框对用户进行提示，则为 ；如果对话框不征得用户许可就自动覆盖现有文件，则为 。

span.span: if the dialog box prompts the user before overwriting an existing file if the user specifies a file name that already exists; if the dialog box automatically overwrites the existing file without prompting the user for permission.

summary.span: 将所有对话框选项重置为默认值。

span.span: Resets all dialog box options to their default values.
